introduction:
Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.

Most modern diseases are 'diseases of excess'â€”excess sugar, excess fat, and excess chemicals. Diet Therapy in Naturopathy is not just about calorie counting; it is about chemistry. It is about providing the right raw materials for your body to repair itself.

Our Functional Nutrition Counseling looks at food as information. Does your lunch tell your body to store fat and inflame? Or does it tell it to burn energy and repair?

sections.title: Our Dietary Principles
sections.content:
1. Whole Foods: If it came from a plant, eat it. If it was made in a plant, don't.
  2. Alkaline Balance: Disease thrives in an acidic environment. We emphasize alkaline foods (fruits, vegetables) to neutralize acid.
  3. Proper Combinations: Eating fruits with dairy or proteins with starches can cause fermentation. We teach you the art of food combining.
  4. Mindful Eating: Digestion begins in the brain. How you eat is as important as what you eat.

sections.title: Types of Diets We Prescribe
sections.content:
• Elimination Diet: To identify allergies (Gluten, Dairy, etc.).
  • Soothing Diet: For ulcers and IBS (bland, non-irritating).
  • Constructive Diet: High protein and nutrition for recovery.
  • Eliminative Diet: Liquids and raw foods for detoxification.

faq.question: Do I have to become vegan?
faq.answer: We strongly encourage a plant-based diet for healing, as animal products are inflammatory. However, we customize the plan based on your preferences and nutritional needs.

faq.question: Is this a temporary diet?
faq.answer: We don't give you a 'diet' that has an end date. We teach you a lifestyle. We provide recipes and alternatives so you can enjoy food while healing.
